name: Thunder cake (AkA Layers Of Fear)
description:
Chocolate cake. In collaboration with fresh03 and the crew on DMC live. 

Visit DIY MIXERS CREW on Discord https://discord.gg/h5UGxYr

Please comment, mix, and or rate,....it makes us all better mixers. Enjoy :)
author: shakenvape007

reviews.text: Got all my missing ingredients in last week. After a week steep very tasty vape
